description: Aspose.OCR for .NET is a character recognition component built to allow developers to add OCR functionality in their ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It provides a simple set of classes for controlling character recognition.
releaseNotes:
New Features
29002 - Support for French and Spanish languages
21565 - Cyrillic alphabet support
29065 - Support Verdana, Tahoma and Calibri fonts
28403 - Support Courier New
28661 - Create public configuration for image rotation

Enhancements
29342 - Ability to enter language name in upper case
29047 - Returns incorrect exception when resource file fails
27373 - Optimize networks

Bugs
28856 - Index out of range exception
29053 - OcrEngine does not release the source image
29262 - Error in the splitter with symbols
summary: Aspose.OCR for .NET is a character recognition component built to allow developers to add OCR functionality in their .NET applications
title: Aspose.OCR for .NET
